thread.title: EagleForce Health Appoints Dawn Eilenberger as Senior Vice President and General Counsel

author: cnbc.com
title: EagleForce Health Appoints Dawn Eilenberger as Senior Vice President and General Counsel

organizations.name: office of the director of national intelligence

text:
HERNDON, Va., Feb. 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- EagleForce Health, LLC, a leading provider of big data interoperability and advanced analytics, announced today that Ms. Dawn Eilenberger has joined its management team as General Counsel and Senior Vice President. Ms. Eilenberger brings extensive leadership experience to the company after a 35 year career in the Intelligence Community.
Ms. Eilenberger came to EagleForce after retiring from her position as Deputy Director of National Intelligence at the Office of the Director of National Intelligence in 2017. At ODNI, she implemented policies and strategies on a full range of intelligence issues, including collection, analysis, and information sharing. Prior to that position, she served as Inspector General of the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency where she conducted a full range of Intelligence compliance reviews, including the NGA's first financial statement audit. This experience supports a vital component in EagleForce Health's commitment to healthcare safety and accountability. As General Counsel, she is responsible for directing legal initiatives and resolving complex issues to preserve compliance with state and federal regulations within the health care industry. Her work in this capacity will allow EagleForce Health to further establish itself as a role model in the industry. "Ms. Eilenberger's history of attention to detail and commitment to non-compromising excellence provides a crucial ethical and moral compass that is essential in preserving the healthcare industry's accountability for patient health and safety," said Stanley Campbell, Chief Executive Officer of EagleForce Health, "We are honored to have her as a member of our leadership team as she continues to serve both the company and the nation in our focus towards Opioids addiction and the misuse of drug coupons and copayments."
Ms. Eilenberger, in her current position, will provide guidance and support regarding legal policy and industry compliance as well as strategic direction with regard to a number of regulatory and governance issues. Her worldwide experience with institutional fraud and abuse will serve as a specific practice focus as our products continue to support the ethical business practices within the health care domain. She will work to ensure that best business practices are upheld at EagleForce Health as we strive to continue as a positive force for quality assurance and security in the world of big data and healthcare analytics. "I am looking forward to working with the EagleForce Team to advance data interoperability and to improve healthcare outcomes," stated Ms. Eilenberger.
About EagleForce Health, LLC
EagleForce Health is an Advanced Analytics Company that established its pedigree in the Defense and Intelligence sector of the government solving some of the country's biggest challenges. The Company has many patents in the area of eligibility and predictive analytics which it employs in solving some of healthcare's most difficult problems with respect to disparate data interoperability by utilizing artificial intelligence, neural computing and enhanced data modeling. For more information, please contact us or visit our website:
www.TheEagleForce.net
